fields.name: Tomato Sauce
fields.description: A smooth sauce made from pureed tomatoes, often seasoned with herbs and spices.

fields.name: Mozzarella Cheese
fields.description: A soft, white cheese with a high moisture content, commonly used for pizzas.

fields.name: Fresh Basil
fields.description: A green aromatic herb used for its fresh flavor and fragrant aroma.

fields.name: Olive Oil
fields.description: A liquid fat obtained from olives, commonly used for cooking and dressings.

fields.name: Salt
fields.description: A white crystalline substance used to season and preserve food.

fields.name: Pepperoni
fields.description: A spicy Italian-American variety of salami, commonly used as a pizza topping.

fields.name: Oregano
fields.description: A fragrant herb commonly used in Italian cuisine for its robust flavor.

fields.name: Ham
fields.description: A type of meat coming from the hind leg of a pig, often sliced and used as a pizza topping.

fields.name: Pineapple
fields.description: A tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor, often used as a pizza topping.

fields.name: BBQ Sauce
fields.description: A flavorful sauce often made from tomatoes, vinegar, and spices, used as a base or topping.

fields.name: Chicken
fields.description: Poultry meat that is often cooked and sliced for use as a pizza topping.

fields.name: Red Onion
fields.description: A type of onion with a mild to sweet flavor, often sliced and used as a pizza topping or in salads.

fields.name: Bell Peppers
fields.description: A type of sweet pepper that can be green, red, yellow, or orange, commonly used sliced in various dishes.

fields.name: Black Olives
fields.description: A type of olive that is fully ripened, often sliced and used as a pizza topping.

fields.name: Spinach
fields.description: A leafy green vegetable known for its health benefits and commonly used as a pizza topping or in salads.

fields.name: Alfredo Sauce
fields.description: A rich and creamy white sauce made with butter, heavy cream, and Parmesan cheese.

fields.name: Pepperoni Sausage
fields.description: A variant of pepperoni that is thicker and often spicier, used as a topping for pizzas and other dishes.

fields.name: Hunting Sausages
fields.description: Small, smoked sausages made from a mixture of meats, commonly used as a snack or pizza topping.

fields.name: Bulgarian Pepper
fields.description: A type of sweet bell pepper, known for its rich flavor and vibrant colors.

fields.name: Mustard-Honey Sauce
fields.description: A sweet and tangy sauce made by combining mustard and honey, often used as a glaze or dipping sauce.

fields.name: Cheddar Cheese
fields.description: A smooth and sharp-tasting cheese that melts well, commonly used in cooking and as a topping.

fields.name: Bacon
fields.description: Cured meat from the sides and belly of a pig, known for its rich flavor and crispy texture.

fields.name: Green Onions
fields.description: A type of onion that is harvested young, known for its mild flavor and used as a garnish or ingredient in various dishes.
